# ----- Earnings manipulation factor (DSRI) ---------------------
receivables = ts_backfill(df["balance_netReceivables"])
sales = ts_backfill(df["income_revenue"])

dsri_now  = receivables / sales
dsri_prev = ts_delay(dsri_now, 252)
dsri = dsri_now / dsri_prev

alpha = -group_neutralize(
            group_rank_normalized(dsri.replace([np.inf, -np.inf], np.nan), subindustry),
            subindustry)

custom_feature = cs_winsor(alpha, (0.02, 0.98)).rename("custom_feature")
